attributes.additional_details:
Windchimes are irritating, intrusive and antisocial.

Those who put them up are the same by their selfish action.

This house moves that the installation of any windchime be a criminal offence and the manufacture of further windchimes be outlawed forthwith.

This is a serious issue and the passage of this bill would be a positive blow against the antisocial behaviour of the ignorant affluent.
